EmailTemplate.name: Georgia Corp Dissolution
EmailTemplate.subject: Georgia Corp Dissolution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SUBJECT LINE: Your LegalZoom Order# XXXXXXXX - URGENT ACTION REQUIRED
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your Dissolution order. Attached, please find the customized Certificate of Cancellation, Dissolution Waiver of Notice and Certification to the California Attorney General?s Office. In order to ensure your order is processed as quickly as possible, please follow the steps listed below.
? Do not make any changes to the attached documents as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Support. ? Certificate of Dissolution and Certificate of Election to Wind Up and Dissolve: please have the director(s) sign and date three (3) copies of these documents. ? Dissolution Waiver of Notice: Enclosed are two slightly different versions of this form. One assumes that you have not yet commenced business, and the other assumes that you have and that all debts have been disbursed. Please sign the appropriate form according to your circumstances and return it to the address below. ? Certificate to the CA Attorney General?s Office ? Please fill out number one (1) pertaining to annual gross revenue. Please have the Director sign this document and return it to the address below. ? Sign your name in black ink on all copies as indicated. ? Mail the documents to our address listed below. Please note that we cannot accept faxes as the state office will only accept original signed documents.
Additional documents required for dissolution: ? A copy of your federal tax returns (form 990, 990EZ, etc) for the past three (3) years. ? A copy of your Articles of Incorporation.
LegalZoom.com, Inc. 101 N. Brand Blvd., 10th Floor POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91209-9096 Attn: Business Filings (Order #XXXXXXX)
{!snippetVariable.cccontactline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccassistline} {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. {!snippetVariable.ourrr} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccbizhourline} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
